=== Test Plan ===

* Install latest (devel-proposed) image on phone
* Install freshly built MPs that are needed for landing (ensure unity-scope-vimeo is installed)
* On the desktop
** Open unity-scope-tool
** Scroll to the Vimeo scope
**** There should be "My Feed" department selected
**** There should be an selection of videos
** Pick a department
**** The list of videos should change to reflect the department chosen
** Search for videos
**** The list of videos should change to reflect the search string
** Preview one of the videos
**** A preview of the video should be presented with an image and description
** Tap the play icon
**** The webbrowser should launch on that video's page
* On the phone
** Perform the same series of checks as for the desktop
